data: As I write in my quiet library the history of those stirring events which began and ended while the bells of 19— were ringing in the New Year in the Kingdom of Bharbazonia, I am interrupted on my literary journey by the sound of a sweet voice singing, in the room below, the robust melody of “The King and the Pope,” my favourite song.
New Year | Kingdom of Bharbazonia | The King and the Pope

As I write in my quiet library the history of those stirring events which began and ended while the bells of 19-- were ringing in the New Year in the Kingdom of Bharbazonia, I am interrupted on my literary journey by the sound of a sweet voice singing, in the room below, the robust melody of "The King and the Pope," my favourite song.
The Red Fox's Son: A Romance of Bharbazonia
Dilley, Edgar M. (Edgar Meck), 1874-1960; Goss, John, 1886-1963 [Illustrator]
